listItemsInFolder.description: List the files and folders in a folder

maxSizeInBytes.description: Filter the items by maximum size (in bytes)

modifiedAfter.description: Filter the items modified after the given date

folderId.description: The folder ID to list the items from. Leave empty to list items from the root folder.

nextToken.description: The token to get the next page of items. Leave empty to get the first page.

items.description: The files and folders in the folder

absolutePath.description: The absolute path of the file. Leave empty if not available.

contentHash.description: The hash of the file content, or version/revision number, if available

id.description: The file's ID. This could be a unique identifier from the external service, or a relative or absolute path, so long as it's unique.

lastModifiedDate.description: The last modified date of the file, if available

name.description: The file's name. This will be displayed in the Botpress UI and be used as the file's name on Files API."

parentId.description: The parent folder ID. Leave empty if the file is in the root folder.
